type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Step Height

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/step_height).

Allows a player to walk into a block to step up it at certain heights.

Type ID: `apugli:step_height`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Step Height

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/step_height).

Allows a player to walk into a block to step up it at certain heights.

Type ID: `apugli:step_height`



---

lower_height.description: The height at which the entity's lower body must meet compared to the upper bounds of the block to step up onto it.
lower_height.markdownDescription: The height at which the entity's lower body must meet compared to the upper bounds of the block to step up onto it.

upper_height.description: The height at which the entity's upper body must meet compared to the lower bounds of the block to step below it.
upper_height.markdownDescription: The height at which the entity's upper body must meet compared to the lower bounds of the block to step below it.

allow_jump_after.description: Whether a player can jump straight after stepping up a block.
allow_jump_after.markdownDescription: Whether a player can jump straight after stepping up a block.
